file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 74-21-01-02 - IGNITERS - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL IGNITERS - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to replace the igniters of the engine. B. These procedures are applicable to the LH and RH engines. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 74-21-01-960-801-A ♦ IGNITERS - REPLACEMENT EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 74-21-01 Page 1 of 3 Rev 52 - Apr 28/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 74-21-01-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. IGNITERS - REPLACEMENT A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to replace the igniters. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - INSTALLATION Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 74-21-10 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 LH Engine Lower Cowling 423 RH Engine Lower Cowling 412 LH Engine Upper Cowling 422 RH Engine Upper Cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area 01 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task Engine work area I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: – POWERPLANT START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 74-21-01 Page 2 of 3 Rev 52 - Apr 28/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the engine upper cowling (LH or RH). Refer to (AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400). J. Discard Igniters SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) Remove the igniters. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 74-21-10. (2) Discard the igniters. (3) Install new igniters. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 74-21-10. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close these circuit breakers. • POWERPLANT START 1/2. (2) Install the upper cowling. Refer to (AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 74-21-01 Page 3 of 3 Rev 52 - Apr 28/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
